body:
In the past few days i have played nexus leveled up to level 10 and have gained over 300xp and doing that with my k/d which is about 0.6 i have gained about 6000 places on the leader board!

Has that happened to any of you and what is your k/d because of it.

Matt.
body_tagged:

title: How Nexus Has Helped Me!

replies.body: Yes it took me from KDR 2.213 to 1.989. But when I got barbarian It started to increase from 1.9 to 2.14. I increased it by playing a lot of Nexus and only playing little games which won't have much good people.
